steps.notes: Assemble 6-DOF industrial robotic manipulator from BOM components including mechanical structure, actuation, power, control, sensing, end effector, wiring, and safety systems

recipe_def.assumptions: Assemble per BOM; parts produced via part-level routes; imported compute as part.
recipe_def.notes: Recipe for labor_bot_general_v0 assembly from detailed BOM components.

steps.notes: Hall-Hroult electrolysis at ~960C. Very energy-intensive (15 kWh/kg)

inputs.notes: Aluminum oxide extracted from highland regolith
Flux to lower melting point (~90% recycled)

recipe_def.assumptions:
Hall-Hroult process produces aluminum suitable for structural applications.
Cryolite flux is 90% recyclable. Carbon anode consumption rate is 0.5 kg per kg aluminum.
Energy requirement: 15 kWh/kg is realistic for electrolytic aluminum production.
recipe_def.notes:
Aluminum alloy ingot production via Hall-Hroult electrolysis from alumina.

This is the standard industrial process for primary aluminum production.
Extremely energy-intensive (15 kWh/kg output) but enables local aluminum
production from lunar highland regolith.

Process chain from regolith:
1. Highland regolith (100 kg)  alumina extraction  12 kg alumina
2. Alumina (2 kg)  Hall-Hroult smelting  1 kg aluminum ingot
3. Therefore: ~17 kg regolith  1 kg aluminum ingot

Replaces placeholder recipe that incorrectly used generic melting/casting.

steps.notes: Mine mare regolith from surface
Screen and separate size fractions
Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

recipe_def.notes: Placeholder recipe: produces aluminum_wire from regolith_metal_crude via wire_drawing_aluminum_v0 (ISRU metal -> wire + scrap).

steps.notes: Mine mare regolith from surface
Screen and separate size fractions
Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

steps.notes: Cast metal billets/ingots
Roll to sheet/plate form
Trim and finish edges

recipe_def.assumptions: ISRU route using regolith metal; 5% casting loss, 2% rolling loss, 3% machining loss
recipe_def.notes: ISRU variant using regolith_metal_crude from regolith. Enables local production of sheet metal and structural steel.

steps.notes: Cast aluminum link blank
CNC machine mounting surfaces and cable channels
Verify dimensions and structural integrity

inputs.notes: Aluminum alloy for casting or forming link structure

recipe_def.notes: Robot arm link manufacturing from aluminum casting with precision machining for mounting surfaces.

steps.notes: Cut steel tubing or angle iron for frame members
Weld frame structure with mounting points and reinforcements
Machine mounting holes, leveling surfaces, alignment features

recipe_def.assumptions: Welded steel frame from tubing or angle iron. Mounting surfaces machined for accuracy.
recipe_def.notes: Small machine frame for light machinery with welded construction and machined mounting points.

steps.notes: Cast motor housing
Machine stator bore and mounting surfaces
Final inspection and preparation

recipe_def.assumptions: 50 kg cast motor housing for medium drive motor.

steps.notes: Cast motor housing, rotor shaft, and stator core laminations
Machine rotor shaft, bearing journals, and stator bore to precision tolerances
Wind three-phase stator coils for AC induction motor
Assemble motor with bearings, cooling fan, terminal box, and electrical connections
Balance rotor assembly to minimize vibration
Test motor operation, verify power output and cooling

recipe_def.assumptions: Three-phase AC induction motor with 5-20 kW power range. Fan-cooled for industrial machinery applications.
recipe_def.notes: Medium electric motor for industrial machinery. 80 kg motor suitable for pumps, mills, compressors. Total fabrication time ~15-16 hours.
